svg:
<rect x="0.00cm" y="0.00cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#AFDFE4"" /> Aqua 水色 #AFDFE4 <rect x="3.70cm" y="0.00cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#000000"" /> Black 黑色 #000000 <rect x="7.40cm" y="0.00cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#0000FF"" /> Blue 蓝色 #0000FF <rect x="11.10cm" y="0.00cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#F400A1"" /> Fuchsia 品红 #F400A1 <rect x="0.00cm" y="0.45cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#808080"" /> Gray 灰色 #808080 <rect x="3.70cm" y="0.45cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#008000"" /> Green 绿色 #008000 <rect x="7.40cm" y="0.45cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#00FF00"" /> Lime 鲜绿色 #00FF00 <rect x="11.10cm" y="0.45cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#800000"" /> Maroon 栗色 #800000 <rect x="0.00cm" y="0.90cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#000080"" /> Navy 藏青 #000080 <rect x="3.70cm" y="0.90cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#808000"" /> Olive 橄榄色 #808000 <rect x="7.40cm" y="0.90cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#800080"" /> Purple 紫色 #800080 <rect x="11.10cm" y="0.90cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#FF0000"" /> Red 红色 #FF0000 <rect x="0.00cm" y="1.35cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#C0C0C0"" /> Silver 银色 #C0C0C0 <rect x="3.70cm" y="1.35cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#008080"" /> Teal 凫绿 #008080 <rect x="7.40cm" y="1.35cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#FFFFFF"" /> White 白色 #FFFFFF <rect x="11.10cm" y="1.35cm" width="3.7cm" height=".45cm" fill="#FFFF00"" /> Yellow 黄色 #FFFF00
Black 黑色 #000000 Blue 蓝色 #0000FF Navy 藏青 #000080 Purple 紫色 #800080
